Class Profile.Port

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.cg.lib.Profile.Port
  • Enclosing class:
    Profile

    public static class Profile.Port
extends java.lang.Object
    The port information to interface with modular code.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Port

        public Port(java.lang.String name,
            boolean publisher,
            boolean subscriber,
            int width,
            int rate,
            int type,
            boolean input,
            boolean output,
            boolean multiport,
            java.lang.String pubSubChannelName)
        Create the port.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the port.
        publisher - A flag that specifies whether it is a subscriber.
        subscriber - A flag that specifies whether it is a publisher.
        width - The width of the port.
        rate - The rate of the port
        type - The code type of the port that can be mapped back to ptolemy type
        input - A flag that specifies whether the port is an input port.
        output - A flag that specifies whether the port is an output port.
        multiport - A flag that specifies whether the port is multiport
        pubSubChannelName - The name
